name: The Starry Night
short_description: The Starry Night is an oil on canvas by the Dutch post-impressionist painter Vincent van Gogh.

name: The Scream
short_description: The Scream is the popular name given to a composition created by Norwegian Expressionist artist Edvard Munch in 1893.
